job.title: Data & Applied Scientist
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Welcome to join us if you are passionate in bringing good search experience to millions of Bing Local Search users. Our team deals with huge amount of data from global markets and try to serve our users the most attractive and helpful information when they search for local business.  The Bing local retail and category search team is looking for passionate applied scientist to help us deliver the excellent local search experience in Bing across data/algorithm/infrastructure & application-level work.  The scope of this position will mainly focus on building the personalized search experience and local recommendation with highly scalability and performance and high user engagement.  This position allows you to learn more details of the search internals: algorithms/infrastructures/data. You will have insight of how Search works end-to-end. You will also have chance to learn how to build highly efficient search and recommendation system to handle huge amount of traffic on large scale data.  Our team has the culture of result-driven/agile and inclusive. In this team, you will have the chance to work with talent world class engineers in search area to design/implement and ship the feature that can impact millions of end users. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.  Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.  #Search# #WebXT# #MachineLearning#
